019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonArray;
022import com.google.gson.JsonElement;
023import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
024import com.google.gson.JsonPrimitive;
025import java.util.Optional;
026import java.util.function.Supplier;
027
028/**
029 * Utility class for pointing to elements on a Gson (Json) tree.
030 */
031@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis",
032    "PMD.ClassWithOnlyPrivateConstructorsShouldBeFinal" })
033public class GsonPtr {
034
035    private final JsonElement position;
036
037    private GsonPtr(JsonElement root) {
038        this.position = root;
039    }
040
041    /**
042     * Create a new instance pointing to the given element.
043     *
044     * @param root the root
045     * @return the Gson pointer
046     */
047    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ShortMethodName")
048    public static GsonPtr to(JsonElement root) {
049        return new GsonPtr(root);
050    }
051
052    /**
053     * Create a new instance pointing to the {@link JsonElement} 
054     * selected by the given selectors. If a selector of type 
055     * {@link String} denotes a non-existant member of a
056     * {@link JsonObject}, a new member (of type {@link JsonObject}
057     * is added.
058     *
059     * @param selectors the selectors
060     * @return the Gson pointer
061     */
062    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ShortMethodName", "PMD.PreserveStackTrace" })
063    public GsonPtr to(Object... selectors) {
064        JsonElement element = position;
065        for (Object sel : selectors) {
066            if (element instanceof JsonObject obj
067                && sel instanceof String member) {
068                element = Optional.ofNullable(obj.get(member)).orElseGet(() -> {
069                    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
070                    var child = new JsonObject();
071                    obj.add(member, child);
072                    return child;
073                });
074                continue;
075            }
076            if (element instanceof JsonArray arr
077                && sel instanceof Integer index) {
078                try {
079                    element = arr.get(index);
080                } catch (IndexOutOfBoundsException e) {
081                    throw new IllegalStateException("Selected array index"
082                        + " may not be empty.");
083                }
084                continue;
085            }
086            throw new IllegalStateException("Invalid selection");
087        }
088        return new GsonPtr(element);
089    }
090
091    /**
092     * Returns {@link JsonElement} that the pointer points to.
093     *
094     * @return the result
095     */
096    public JsonElement get() {
097        return position;
098    }
099
100    /**
101     * Returns {@link JsonElement} that the pointer points to,
102     * casted to the given type.
103     *
104     * @param <T> the generic type
105     * @param cls the cls
106     * @return the result
107     */
108    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidBranchingStatementAsLastInLoop" })
109    public <T extends JsonElement> T get(Class<T> cls) {
110        if (cls.isAssignableFrom(position.getClass())) {
111            return cls.cast(position);
112        }
113        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Not positioned at element"
114            + " of desired type.");
115    }
116
117    /**
118     * Returns the selected {@link JsonElement}, cast to the class
119     * specified.
120     *
121     * @param <T> the generic type
122     * @param cls the cls
123     * @param selectors the selectors
124     * @return the optional
125     */
126    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidBranchingStatementAsLastInLoop" })
127    public <T extends JsonElement> Optional<T>
128            get(Class<T> cls, Object... selectors) {
129        JsonElement element = position;
130        for (Object sel : selectors) {
131            if (element instanceof JsonObject obj
132                && sel instanceof String member) {
133                element = obj.get(member);
134                if (element == null) {
135                    return Optional.empty();
136                }
137                continue;
138            }
139            if (element instanceof JsonArray arr
140                && sel instanceof Integer index) {
141                try {
142                    element = arr.get(index);
143                } catch (IndexOutOfBoundsException e) {
144                    return Optional.empty();
145                }
146                continue;
147            }
148            return Optional.empty();
149        }
150        if (cls.isAssignableFrom(element.getClass())) {
151            return Optional.of(cls.cast(element));
152        }
153        return Optional.empty();
154    }
155
156    /**
157     * Returns the String value of the selected {@link JsonPrimitive}.
158     *
159     * @param selectors the selectors
160     * @return the as string
161     */
162    public Optional<String> getAsString(Object... selectors) {
163        return get(JsonPrimitive.class, selectors)
164            .map(JsonPrimitive::getAsString);
165    }
166
167    /**
168     * Returns the Integer value of the selected {@link JsonPrimitive}.
169     *
170     * @param selectors the selectors
171     * @return the as string
172     */
173    public Optional<Integer> getAsInt(Object... selectors) {
174        return get(JsonPrimitive.class, selectors)
175            .map(JsonPrimitive::getAsInt);
176    }
177
178    /**
179     * Returns the Long value of the selected {@link JsonPrimitive}.
180     *
181     * @param selectors the selectors
182     * @return the as string
183     */
184    public Optional<Long> getAsLong(Object... selectors) {
185        return get(JsonPrimitive.class, selectors)
186            .map(JsonPrimitive::getAsLong);
187    }
188
189    /**
190     * Sets the selected value. This pointer must point to a
191     * {@link JsonObject} or {@link JsonArray}. The selector must
192     * be a {@link String} or an integer respectively.
193     *
194     * @param selector the selector
195     * @param value the value
196     * @return the Gson pointer
197     */
198    public GsonPtr set(Object selector, JsonElement value) {
199        if (position instanceof JsonObject obj
200            && selector instanceof String member) {
201            obj.add(member, value);
202            return this;
203        }
204        if (position instanceof JsonArray arr
205            && selector instanceof Integer index) {
206            if (index >= arr.size()) {
207                arr.add(value);
208            } else {
209                arr.set(index, value);
210            }
211            return this;
212        }
213        throw new IllegalStateException("Invalid selection");
214    }
215
216    /**
217     * Short for `set(selector, new JsonPrimitive(value))`.
218     *
219     * @param selector the selector
220     * @param value the value
221     * @return the gson ptr
222     * @see #set(Object, JsonElement)
223     */
224    public GsonPtr set(Object selector, String value) {
225        return set(selector, new JsonPrimitive(value));
226    }
227
228    /**
229     * Same as {@link #set(Object, JsonElement)}, but sets the value
230     * only if it doesn't exist yet, else returns the existing value.
231     * If this pointer points to a {@link JsonArray} and the selector
232     * if larger than or equal to the size of the array, the supplied
233     * value will be appended.
234     *
235     * @param <T> the generic type
236     * @param selector the selector
237     * @param supplier the supplier of the missing value
238     * @return the existing or supplied value
239     */
240    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
241    public <T extends JsonElement> T
242            computeIfAbsent(Object selector, Supplier<T> supplier) {
243        if (position instanceof JsonObject obj
244            && selector instanceof String member) {
245            return Optional.ofNullable((T) obj.get(member)).orElseGet(() -> {
246                var res = supplier.get();
247                obj.add(member, res);
248                return res;
249            });
250        }
251        if (position instanceof JsonArray arr
252            && selector instanceof Integer index) {
253            if (index >= arr.size()) {
254                var res = supplier.get();
255                arr.add(res);
256                return res;
257            }
258            return (T) arr.get(index);
259        }
260        throw new IllegalStateException("Invalid selection");
261    }
262
263    /**
264     * Short for `computeIfAbsent(selector, () -> new JsonPrimitive(value))`.
265     *
266     * @param selector the selector
267     * @param value the value
268     * @return the Gson pointer
269     */
270    public GsonPtr getOrSet(Object selector, String value) {
271        computeIfAbsent(selector, () -> new JsonPrimitive(value));
272        return this;
273    }
274
275}
